subject: Re: Help on testing EJBs
msgSnippet: Thanks for your help Brian.  As it turns out, I had several things missing from my Classpath: c: weblogic lib weblogicaux.jar
messageBody:
Thanks for your help Brian. As it turns out, I had several things
missing from my Classpath:
c:\weblogic\lib\weblogicaux.jar
c:\weblogic\lib\lib\tengahbeans.jar
c:\weblogic\classes

Once I added these to the classpath, I was able to access my EJB.

Thanks again for your help!!

Luis

--- In junit@y..., Brian Janaszek <bjanaszek@e...> wrote:
> Be sure that you have your WebLogic auxillary classes in your
> classpath. I'm using WL 5.1 as well and I have:
>
> /u/weblogic/lib/tengahbeans.jar
>
> in my classpath.
>
> brian
